items.sentence: Don\'t worry about it. It\'s not your problem.
You\'ll have to get up early tomorrow morning.
Please wash your hands properly before eating.
Reluctantly, the children got back on the bus.
She was advised by him on how to stay healthy.
Tom told me he had nothing to look forward to.
I suspected that Tom was the one who did that.
I teach French at a nearby junior high school.
I think I can speak French as well as Tom can.
I never realized Tom was interested in French.
